name: Killer Trait
description:
Do NOT reupload, resell or redistribute my game or any of the assets used inside it in any shape or form. ATTENTION!

This game is rated 17+ for strong language, violence, blood & murder. Player discretion is advised. PLEASE, be sure to read the TRIGGER WARNINGS and reconsider if this game is for you. Play responsibly.

Note: Killer Trait is a mystery-thriller visual novel with elements of romance depending on the choices you make. The character you can romance is a man called Oz. The other 2 major characters, Arthur & Aslan are NOT romanceable and I have no intention of adding routes for them.

Thank you~

✘  ✘  ✘ STORY

You've waited so long for this moment... 

Finally, after all those years of hard work in Silvering City, you'll realize your dream of becoming a police detective...! 

Or so you thought.

Betrayed by your boss and accused of a crime you didn't commit, your only option is to join forces with a serial killer.

Will you push your differences aside and work together to get revenge? Or will you stab him in the back for a chance to regain social redemption?

✘  ✘  ✘  FEATURES
  • 5800+ words [Demo, full version will be longer]
  • Nameable MC (default name is Roe)
  • Ability to choose your pronouns 
  • Beautiful cafe food art with a bear theme~
  • Partial voice acting (Only Oz, for now - Full version might have 2 or 3 more VAs)
  • A serial killer who only kills criminals and will be your biggest ally

Not available yet: 

-Full game will have some CGs.

-Full game will consist of 7 in-game days (not counting the prologue which would be DAY 0).

✘  ✘  ✘ TRIGGER WARNINGS CLICK HERE FOR TRIGGER WARNINGS
  • Strong Language (seriously, there is A LOT of cursing; you've been warned)
  • Vigilantism
  • Depictions of blood
  • General violence
  • Depictions of murder
  • Depictions of death 
  • Shaking screen 
  • Possible romance with a serial killer
